name: L2 Token
description: L2T (L2 Token) is the reward token for the zkBTC eco-system. All the bridge fee is collected and managed in a smart contract called Fee Pool, which is evenly shared among all L2T holders. Users may claim zkBTC from Fee Pool with L2T. The zkBTC/L2T ratios within Fee Pool is expected to rise over time as long as users keep bridging.
